ygData.subject: RE: Clarity and song/spell stacking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... How much of a slowdown did the shaman spell have?  I ve been watching for this when an enchanter friend cast a slowdown on a mob we were fighting.  Her
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 17 Nov 1999, Ryan Honeyman wrote:
>
> > I would assume that if Chords of Cessation's slowing effect is messing up a
> > shaman's Yawn, the lvl 20 chords of melodic binding song may do the same?
> > Again, haven't tested it.
>
> Constant Chains breaks the Shaman Drowsy line. Chains breaks any
> vector movement effect AND any attack speed reduction effect, AFAIK.
>
> My tests were done on ice giants in everfrost, with a level 50 shaman
> and myself.

How much of a slowdown did the shaman spell have? I've been
watching for this when an enchanter friend cast a slowdown on
a mob we were fighting. Her spell was a much greater slowdown
than Chain would've caused, and based on my eyeball
observations (combat was too hectic to use a stopwatch) Chain
didn't override the spell.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
